conversation.NPC: Well well well, look who we have here, Johnny Law

PLAYER.TALK: Wisemouth. We both know what happened to Thomas Moore
Quit the act, I know you did it.

conversation.NPC: But I'm not yet in cuffs. What's holding you back?

PLAYER.TALK: I know you did it, I just can't prove it. Yet.

conversation.NPC: But my friend, you must be mistaking. I'm an honest man of the Lord.

PLAYER.TALK: That act won't work on me. But it will on a jury, so without the evidence.......

conversation.NPC: I will keep on living like I do now.

PLAYER.TALK: I guess you leave me no choise....
I can't let you get away with this. *gets very angry*

conversation.NPC: Okey, now don't lose grip of yourself.

PLAYER.TALK: Like you lost grip when you killed that man!

conversation.NPC: Keep calm. Don't do anything stupid.

PLAYER.TALK: Stupid, this makes so much sense to me.
You will never get one happy day in your life again.

conversation.NPC: Oke, put away your gun now. Can't we talk about it?

PLAYER.TALK: You had your chance to talk. Now I have to set the record straight myself

conversation.NPC: No please no, put your gun away and just let me talk.

PLAYER.TALK: Time to meet your Lord *shoots the priest*
